headline: How Is ConocoPhillips’s Stock Performance Compared to Other Oil & Gas E&P Stocks?
summary: ConocoPhillips has underperformed the oil & gas E&P peers over the past year, but analysts remain highly optimistic about the company’s future growth potential.
